answer: The digital credentials 📜 are issued in the language you selected on your profile setup ⚙️ However you can select a different language to download your PDF certificate 🌎
answer_formatted: The digital credentials 📜 are issued in the language you selected on your profile setup ⚙️ However you can select a different language to download your PDF certificate 🌎
